```{r}
#Connecting to the Postgres database

library(DBI)

db <- " "  #database name
db_host <- " "
db_port <- "5432"
db_user <- " "
db_pass <- " "

conn <- dbConnect(
  RPostgres::Postgres(),
  dbname = db,
  host = db_host,
  port = db_port,
  user = db_user,
  password = db_pass
)

```

```{r}
# list the available tables
dbListTables(conn)
```

```{r}

dbGetQuery(conn, "SELECT * FROM earthquakes LIMIT 5")

```
